summary.span: 實作微調方塊 (Spin Box，也稱為上下按鈕控制項) 需要的基本功能。

span.span: Implements the basic functionality required by a spin box (also known as an up-down control).

remarks.format: ## Remarks 微調方塊是由文字方塊和小型的垂直捲軸，通常稱為微調按鈕控制項所組成。A spin box consists of a text box and a small vertical scroll bar, commonly referred to as a spin button control. 連結兩個控制項類別，並可讓使用者變更顯示在文字方塊中，按一下向上或向下按鈕或直接在文字方塊中輸入適當的值類型。The class links the two controls and allows the user to change the display in the text box by clicking the up or down buttons or by entering the appropriate type of value directly into the text box. 使用微調方塊，在您要限制的值，使用者清單的情況下可以選取，類似於清單方塊或下拉式方塊。Use the spin box in cases where you want to limit the list of values a user can select, similar to a list box or combo box. 您想要顯示的清單的類型而定，使用微調方塊的優點是它可讓您快速將範圍設定為有效的值，而不是加入一個項目一次。Depending upon the type of list you want to display, the advantage to using a spin box is that it allows you to quickly set a range of valid values, rather than adding items one at a time. 實作微調方塊，在衍生的類別時，您可以限制的資料類型，需要較少的資料驗證文字方塊中，比。Implementing a spin box requires less data validation than a text box, as you can limit the data type when you derive a class from . 舉例來說，這是類別，這會限制為數值類型的值，並使用和屬性來驗證資料。An example of this is the class, which limits the values to the numeric type and uses a and property to validate the data. 若要讓使用者使用方向鍵來變更微調方塊的內容，設定屬性`true`。To allow the user to use the arrow keys to change the contents of a spin box, set the property to `true`. 若要限制使用者所指定的值，設定屬性`true`。To restrict the user to values you specify, set the property to `true`. 若要控制微調方塊中的文字的對齊方式，設定屬性。To control the alignment of text in the spin box, set the property. 若要設定的向上和向下按鈕相對於控制項的文字方塊部分的對齊方式，設定屬性設為或。To set the alignment of the up and down buttons in relation to the text box portion of the control, set the property to either or . 和方法，覆寫時，會處理按一下向上或向下按鈕。The and methods, when overridden, handle the clicking of the up or down buttons. 覆寫時，和方法驗證的值 （無論是選取或輸入），並更新微調方塊中顯示的文字。When overridden, the and methods validate the value (either selected or entered) and update the text displayed in the spin box. 如果值無法通過驗證，使用方法來選取不是有效的文字。If the value fails validation, use the method to select the text that is not valid. 這可讓使用者快速修正的文字，只要輸入新值，而不需要以手動方式選取或刪除現有的文字。This allows the user to quickly correct the text by simply typing in a new value without having to manually select or delete the existing text. 從.NET Framework 4.6 開始將會根據系統 DPI 設定時的 app.config 檔案包含下列項目調整控制項的大小：Starting with the .NET Framework 4.6, the control will be resized based on the system DPI setting when the app.config file contains the following entry: ``` ``` ## Examples 下列程式碼範例會使用衍生的類別和設定的某些屬性衍生自。The following code example uses the derived class and sets some of its properties derived from . 此程式碼，您必須擁有控制項，名為`numericUpDown1`、 兩個控制項名為`comboBox1`和`comboBox2`，和三個控制項名為`checkBox1`， `checkBox2`，和`checkBox2`在表單上建立。This code requires that you have a control named `numericUpDown1`, two controls named `comboBox1` and `comboBox2`, and three controls named `checkBox1`, `checkBox2`, and `checkBox2` created on a form. 將下列項目加入`comboBox1`: `None`， `Fixed3D`，和`FixedSingle`。Add the following items to `comboBox1`: `None`, `Fixed3D`, and `FixedSingle`. 將下列項目加入`comboBox2`: `Left`， `Right`，和`Center`。Add the following items to `comboBox2`: `Left`, `Right`, and `Center`. 程式碼可讓您在執行階段變更的屬性值，並查看每一個影響的外觀和行為的微調方塊。The code allows you to change the property values at run time and see how each affects the appearance and behavior of the spin box. remarks.format: ## Remarks 如需處理事件的詳細資訊，請參閱[處理和引發事件](~/docs/standard/events/index.md)。For more information about handling events, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md). ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用這個成員。The following code example demonstrates the use of this member. 在範例中，事件處理常式會報告一次事件。In the example, an event handler reports on the occurrence of the event. 此報表可協助您了解事件發生的時機，並可協助您偵錯。This report helps you to learn when the event occurs and can assist you in debugging. 若要報告多個事件或事件經常發生，請考慮更換與或將訊息附加到多行。To report on multiple events or on events that occur frequently, consider replacing with or appending the message to a multiline . 若要執行範例程式碼，將它貼到包含繼承自類型的執行個體的專案，例如或。To run the example code, paste it into a project that contains an instance of a type that inherits from , such as a or . 然後將其命名執行個體`UpDownBase1`，並確認事件處理常式關聯事件。Then name the instance `UpDownBase1` and ensure that the event handler is associated with the event. remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果屬性設定為`true`微調方塊 （也稱為上下按鈕控制項） 具有焦點，使用者可以使用向上和向下鍵來選取值。If the property is set to `true` and the spin box (also known as an up-down control) has focus, the user can use the UP ARROW and DOWN ARROW keys to select values. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例會使用衍生的類別和設定的某些屬性衍生自。The following code example uses the derived class and sets some of its properties derived from . 此程式碼，您必須擁有控制項，名為`numericUpDown1`、 兩個控制項名為`comboBox1`和`comboBox2`，和三個控制項名為`checkBox1`， `checkBox2`，和`checkBox2`在表單上建立。This code requires that you have a control named `numericUpDown1`, two controls named `comboBox1` and `comboBox2`, and three controls named `checkBox1`, `checkBox2`, and `checkBox2` created on a form. 將下列項目加入`comboBox1`: `None`， `Fixed3D`，和`FixedSingle`。Add the following items to `comboBox1`: `None`, `Fixed3D`, and `FixedSingle`. 將下列項目加入`comboBox2`: `Left`， `Right`，和`Center`。Add the following items to `comboBox2`: `Left`, `Right`, and `Center`. 程式碼可讓您在執行階段變更的屬性值，並查看每一個影響的外觀和行為的微調方塊。The code allows you to change the property values at run time and see how each affects the appearance and behavior of the spin box. [!code-cpp[Classic UpDownBase Example#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Classic UpDownBase Example/CPP/source.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[Classic UpDownBase Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Classic UpDownBase Example/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic UpDownBase Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Classic UpDownBase Example/VB/source.vb#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 引發事件會透過委派叫用此事件處理常式。Raising an event invokes the event handler through a delegate. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[處理和引發事件](~/docs/standard/events/index.md)。For more information, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md). 方法也允許衍生類別處理事件，而不用附加委派。The method also allows derived classes to handle the event without attaching a delegate. 這是在衍生類別中處理事件的慣用技巧。This is the preferred technique for handling the event in a derived class.

span.para: 在覆寫在衍生類別中，請務必呼叫基底類別的方法，使已註冊的委派能接收到事件。
When overriding in a derived class, be sure to call the base class's method so that registered delegates receive the event.
